results.text: But about that day or hour no one knows, not even the angels in heaven, nor the Son, but only the Father.
results.reason: Emphasizes the unknown timing of Jesus' return.
results.reflection: Trust in God's timing, for He alone knows the appointed hour.

results.text: So you also must be ready, because the Son of Man will come at an hour when you do not expect him.
results.reason: Encourages believers to be prepared for Jesus' return at any moment.
results.reflection: Live each day in readiness and anticipation of Christ's coming.

results.text: For you know very well that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.
results.reason: Compares Jesus' return to a thief in the night, emphasizing surprise.
results.reflection: Stay vigilant and spiritually prepared for the unexpected return of Christ.

results.text: He who testifies to these things says, 'Yes, I am coming soon.' Amen. Come, Lord Jesus.
results.reason: Expresses the anticipation and longing for Jesus' imminent return.
results.reflection: Echo the cry for Jesus' swift return and eagerly await His coming.

results.text: But the day of the Lord will come like a thief. The heavens will disappear with a roar; the elements will be destroyed by fire, and the earth and everything done in it will be laid bare.
results.reason: Portrays the dramatic and sudden nature of Jesus' return.
results.reflection: Be prepared for the grand and transformative event of Christ's return.
